Text: off[-3] ##I don't know, maybe I got a defective one but first, the player would not shut off, next, the player would not come on - I had to send it away to get repaired.  ear phone jack[-3]  Now, the player's ear phone jack is not working - I have to send it away again.  player[+1][p]  When it's working, it's great but it is very tempermental.
